attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people more students and parents want the cost of university tutoring to be abolished. As it is all ready in scotland it would be a credit to our nation for free university education giving people more of the chance for further studes after college 6th form and other such studies.This free education will also help us to have more teachers doctors nurses surgeons etc. in the country thus making us more sustainable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
